Index of All Objects

ADOM Controller Config Objects Reference (For v7.0)


This documentation applies to v7.0 devices or ADOM, latest release (build 623).

extender-controller/extender (table)

Extender controller configuration.

Require device/vdom scope member.

Supported methods: get (table), get (object), add, set, update, delete, clone

Object URL:
Table/pm/config/adom/<adom_name>/obj/extender-controller/extender
Object/pm/config/adom/<adom_name>/obj/extender-controller/extender/<extender_name>
Attribute ListDescriptions
_dataplandatasource, support meta variable, refer to extender-controller dataplan
_templatedatasource, support meta variable, refer to extender-controller template
allowaccessflags, support meta variable
Control management access to the managed extender. Separate entries with a space.
"https"HTTPS access.
"ping"PING access.
"ssh"SSH access.
"snmp"SNMP access.
"http"HTTP access.
"telnet"TELNET access.
authorizedoption, support meta variable
FortiExtender Administration (enable or disable).
"disable"Controller is configured to not provide service to this FortiExtender.
"enable"Controller is configured to provide service to this FortiExtender.
bandwidth-limitunsigned int32, support meta variable
FortiExtender LAN extension bandwidth limit (Mbps).
controller-reportobject, support meta variable
descriptionstring, support meta variable
Description.
device-idunsigned int32, support meta variable
Device ID.
enforce-bandwidthoption, support meta variable
Enable/disable enforcement of bandwidth on LAN extension interface.
"disable"Disable to enforce bandwidth limit on LAN extension interface.
"enable"Enable to enforce bandwidth limit on LAN extension interface.
ext-namestring, support meta variable
FortiExtender name.
extension-typeoption, support meta variable
Extension type for this FortiExtender.
"wan-extension"FortiExtender wan-extension.
"lan-extension"FortiExtender lan-extension.
idstring, support meta variable (128 bytes)
FortiExtender serial number.
login-passwordpassword, support meta variable
Set the managed extender's administrator password.
login-password-changeoption, support meta variable
Change or reset the administrator password of a managed extender (yes, default, or no, default = no).
"no"Do not change the managed extender's administrator password.
"yes"Change the managed extender's administrator password. Use the login-password option to set the password.
"default"Keep the managed extender's administrator password set to the factory default.
modem1object, support meta variable
modem2object, support meta variable
namestring, support meta variable (128 bytes), master key
FortiExtender entry name.
override-allowaccessoption, support meta variable
Enable to override the extender profile management access configuration.
"disable"Use the extender profile management access configuration.
"enable"Override the extender profile management access configuration.
override-enforce-bandwidthoption, support meta variable
Enable to override the extender profile enforce-bandwidth setting.
"disable"Disable override of FortiExtender profile bandwidth setting.
"enable"Enable override of FortiExtender profile bandwidth setting.
override-login-password-changeoption, support meta variable
Enable to override the extender profile login-password (administrator password) setting.
"disable"Use the the WTP profile login-password (administrator password) setting.
"enable"Override the WTP profile login-password (administrator password) setting.
profiledatasource, support meta variable, refer to extender-controller extender-profile (maximum 1)
FortiExtender profile configuration.
scope memberscope object, refer to device object
vdomunsigned int32, support meta variable
wan-extensionobject, support meta variable

 

extender-controller/extender/controller-report (object)

FortiExtender controller report configuration.

Require device/vdom scope member.

Supported methods: get, set, update

Object URL:
Table object/pm/config/adom/<adom_name>/obj/extender-controller/extender/<extender_name>/controller-report
Attribute ListDescriptions
intervalunsigned int32, support meta variable
Controller report interval.
scope memberscope object, refer to device object
signal-thresholdunsigned int32, support meta variable
Controller report signal threshold.
statusoption, support meta variable
FortiExtender controller report status.
"disable"Controller is configured to not provide service to this FortiExtender.
"enable"Controller is configured to provide service to this FortiExtender.

 

extender-controller/extender/modem1 (object)

Configuration options for modem 1.

Require device/vdom scope member.

Supported methods: get, set, update

Object URL:
Table object/pm/config/adom/<adom_name>/obj/extender-controller/extender/<extender_name>/modem1
Attribute ListDescriptions
_ifnamedatasource, support meta variable, refer to dynamic interface
_sim_profiledatasource, support meta variable, refer to extender-controller sim_profile
auto-switchobject, support meta variable
conn-statusunsigned int32, support meta variable
default-simoption, support meta variable
Default SIM selection.
"sim1"Use SIM #1 by default.
"sim2"Use SIM #2 by default.
"carrier"Assign default SIM based on carrier.
"cost"Assign default SIM based on cost.
gpsoption, support meta variable
FortiExtender GPS enable/disable.
"disable"Disable GPS.
"enable"Enable GPS.
ifnamedatasource, support meta variable, refer to system interface (maximum 1)
FortiExtender interface name.
modem-idunsigned int32, support meta variable
preferred-carrierstring, support meta variable
Preferred carrier.
redundant-intfstring, support meta variable
Redundant interface.
redundant-modeoption, support meta variable
FortiExtender mode.
"disable"Disable interface redundancy.
"enable"Enable interface redundancy.
scope memberscope object, refer to device object
sim1-pinoption, support meta variable
SIM #1 PIN status.
"disable"Disable SIM #1 pin.
"enable"Enable SIM #1 pin.
sim1-pin-codepassword, support meta variable
SIM #1 PIN password.
sim2-pinoption, support meta variable
SIM #2 PIN status.
"disable"Disable SIM #2 pin.
"enable"Enable SIM #2 pin.
sim2-pin-codepassword, support meta variable
SIM #2 PIN password.

 

extender-controller/extender/modem1/auto-switch (object)

FortiExtender auto switch configuration.

Require device/vdom scope member.

Supported methods: get, set, update

Object URL:
Table object/pm/config/adom/<adom_name>/obj/extender-controller/extender/<extender_name>/modem1/auto-switch
Attribute ListDescriptions
dataplanoption, support meta variable
Automatically switch based on data usage.
"disable"Disable switching of SIM card based on cellular data usage.
"enable"Enable switching of SIM card based on cellular data usage.
disconnectoption, support meta variable
Auto switch by disconnect.
"disable"Disable switching of SIM card based on cellular disconnections.
"enable"Enable switching of SIM card based on cellular disconnections.
disconnect-periodunsigned int32, support meta variable
Automatically switch based on disconnect period.
disconnect-thresholdunsigned int32, support meta variable
Automatically switch based on disconnect threshold.
scope memberscope object, refer to device object
signaloption, support meta variable
Automatically switch based on signal strength.
"disable"Disable switching of SIM card based on cellular signal quality.
"enable"Enable switching of SIM card based on cellular signal quality.
switch-backflags, support meta variable
Auto switch with switch back multi-options.
"time"Switch back based on specific time in UTC (HH:MM).
"timer"Switch back based on an interval.
switch-back-timestring, support meta variable
Automatically switch over to preferred SIM/carrier at a specified time in UTC (HH:MM).
switch-back-timerunsigned int32, support meta variable
Automatically switch over to preferred SIM/carrier after the given time (3600 - 2147483647 sec).

 

extender-controller/extender/modem2 (object)

Configuration options for modem 2.

Require device/vdom scope member.

Supported methods: get, set, update

Object URL:
Table object/pm/config/adom/<adom_name>/obj/extender-controller/extender/<extender_name>/modem2
Attribute ListDescriptions
_ifnamedatasource, support meta variable, refer to dynamic interface
_sim_profiledatasource, support meta variable, refer to extender-controller sim_profile
auto-switchobject, support meta variable
conn-statusunsigned int32, support meta variable
default-simoption, support meta variable
Default SIM selection.
"sim1"Use SIM #1 by default.
"sim2"Use SIM #2 by default.
"carrier"Assign default SIM based on carrier.
"cost"Assign default SIM based on cost.
gpsoption, support meta variable
FortiExtender GPS enable/disable.
"disable"Disable GPS.
"enable"Enable GPS.
ifnamedatasource, support meta variable, refer to system zone, system interface, or dynamic interface (maximum 1)
FortiExtender interface name.
modem-idunsigned int32, support meta variable
preferred-carrierstring, support meta variable
Preferred carrier.
redundant-intfstring, support meta variable
Redundant interface.
redundant-modeoption, support meta variable
FortiExtender mode.
"disable"Disable interface redundancy.
"enable"Enable interface redundancy.
scope memberscope object, refer to device object
sim1-pinoption, support meta variable
SIM #1 PIN status.
"disable"Disable SIM #1 pin.
"enable"Enable SIM #1 pin.
sim1-pin-codepassword, support meta variable
SIM #1 PIN password.
sim2-pinoption, support meta variable
SIM #2 PIN status.
"disable"Disable SIM #2 pin.
"enable"Enable SIM #2 pin.
sim2-pin-codepassword, support meta variable
SIM #2 PIN password.

 

extender-controller/extender/modem2/auto-switch (object)

FortiExtender auto switch configuration.

Require device/vdom scope member.

Supported methods: get, set, update

Object URL:
Table object/pm/config/adom/<adom_name>/obj/extender-controller/extender/<extender_name>/modem2/auto-switch
Attribute ListDescriptions
dataplanoption, support meta variable
Automatically switch based on data usage.
"disable"Disable switching of SIM card based on cellular data usage.
"enable"Enable switching of SIM card based on cellular data usage.
disconnectoption, support meta variable
Auto switch by disconnect.
"disable"Disable switching of SIM card based on cellular disconnections.
"enable"Enable switching of SIM card based on cellular disconnections.
disconnect-periodunsigned int32, support meta variable
Automatically switch based on disconnect period.
disconnect-thresholdunsigned int32, support meta variable
Automatically switch based on disconnect threshold.
scope memberscope object, refer to device object
signaloption, support meta variable
Automatically switch based on signal strength.
"disable"Disable switching of SIM card based on cellular signal quality.
"enable"Enable switching of SIM card based on cellular signal quality.
switch-backflags, support meta variable
Auto switch with switch back multi-options.
"time"Switch back based on specific time in UTC (HH:MM).
"timer"Switch back based on an interval.
switch-back-timestring, support meta variable
Automatically switch over to preferred SIM/carrier at a specified time in UTC (HH:MM).
switch-back-timerunsigned int32, support meta variable
Automatically switch over to preferred SIM/carrier after the given time (3600 - 2147483647 sec).

 

extender-controller/extender/wan-extension (object)

FortiExtender wan extension configuration.

Require device/vdom scope member.

Supported methods: get, set, update

Object URL:
Table object/pm/config/adom/<adom_name>/obj/extender-controller/extender/<extender_name>/wan-extension
Attribute ListDescriptions
modem1-extensiondatasource, support meta variable, refer to system interface, or dynamic interface (maximum 1)
FortiExtender interface name.
modem2-extensiondatasource, support meta variable, refer to system interface, or dynamic interface (maximum 1)
FortiExtender interface name.
scope memberscope object, refer to device object

 

fsp/managed-switch (table)

Require device/vdom scope member.

Supported methods: get (table), get (object), add, set, update, delete, move, clone

Object URL:
Table/pm/config/adom/<adom_name>/obj/fsp/managed-switch
Object/pm/config/adom/<adom_name>/obj/fsp/managed-switch/<managed-switch_switch-id>
Attribute ListDescriptions
descriptionstring
is-model[read-only] option
"disable"
"enable"
os_version[read-only] string
platform[read-only] string
scope memberscope object, refer to device object
snstring
state[read-only] option
"disable"
"enable"
"discovered"[Default value]
status[read-only] option
"idle"
"connecting"
"connected"
"image-downloading"
"connected-image"
"unknown"[Default value]
switch-idstring, master key
templatedatasource, refer to switch-controller managed-switch
type[read-only] option
"physical"[Default value]
"virtual"
vlan-interface[read-only] string

 

fsp/packet-capture (table)

Require device/vdom scope member.

Supported methods: get (table), get (object), add, set, update, delete, clone

Object URL:
Table/pm/config/adom/<adom_name>/obj/fsp/packet-capture
Object/pm/config/adom/<adom_name>/obj/fsp/packet-capture/<packet-capture_id>
Attribute ListDescriptions
erspan-ipIPv4 address
filtersstring
firewall-snifferobject
idsequence, master key
last_endtime[read-only] unsigned int64
last_runtime[read-only] unsigned int64
max_packetunsigned int32
modeoption
"none"
"erspan-auto"
"rspan"
sched_endunsigned int64
sched_startunsigned int64
scope memberscope object, refer to device object
status[read-only] option
"unscheduled"
"scheduled"
"running"
"done"
"error"
target-iptable
target-mactable
target-porttable

 

fsp/packet-capture/firewall-sniffer (object)

Configure sniffer.

Require device/vdom scope member.

Supported methods: get, set, update

Object URL:
Table object/pm/config/adom/<adom_name>/obj/fsp/packet-capture/<packet-capture_id>/firewall-sniffer
Attribute ListDescriptions
application-listdatasource, refer to application list (maximum 1)
Name of an existing application list.
application-list-statusoption
Enable/disable application control profile.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
av-profiledatasource, refer to antivirus profile (maximum 1)
Name of an existing antivirus profile.
av-profile-statusoption
Enable/disable antivirus profile.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
casb-profiledatasource, refer to casb profile
casb-profile-statusoption
"disable"
"enable"
casi-profiledatasource, refer to application casi profile
casi-profile-statusoption
"disable"
"enable"
dlp-profiledatasource, refer to dlp profile
dlp-profile-statusoption
"disable"
"enable"
dlp-sensordatasource, refer to dlp sensor (maximum 1)
Name of an existing DLP sensor.
dlp-sensor-statusoption
Enable/disable DLP sensor.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
dsrioption
Enable/disable DSRI.
"disable"Disable DSRI.
"enable"Enable DSRI.
emailfilter-profiledatasource, refer to emailfilter profile (maximum 1)
Name of an existing email filter profile.
emailfilter-profile-statusoption
Enable/disable emailfilter.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
file-filter-profiledatasource, refer to file-filter profile (maximum 1)
Name of an existing file-filter profile.
file-filter-profile-statusoption
Enable/disable file filter.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
free-styleoption
"disable"
"enable"
free-style-filterstring
hoststring
Hosts to filter for in sniffer traffic (Format examples: 1.1.1.1, 2.2.2.0/24, 3.3.3.3/255.255.255.0, 4.4.4.0-4.4.4.240).
idsequence
Sniffer ID (0 - 9999).
interfacestring
Interface name that traffic sniffing will take place on.
ip-threatfeeddatasource, refer to system external-resource
Name of an existing IP threat feed.
ip-threatfeed-statusoption
Enable/disable IP threat feed.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
ips-dos-statusoption
Enable/disable IPS DoS anomaly detection.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
ips-sensordatasource, refer to ips sensor (maximum 1)
Name of an existing IPS sensor.
ips-sensor-statusoption
Enable/disable IPS sensor.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.
ipv6option
Enable/disable sniffing IPv6 packets.
"disable"Disable sniffer for IPv6 packets.
"enable"Enable sniffer for IPv6 packets.
logtrafficoption
Either log all sessions, only sessions that have a security profile applied, or disable all logging for this policy.
"disable"Disable all logging for this policy.
"all"Log all sessions accepted or denied by this policy.
"utm"Log traffic that has a security profile applied to it.
max-packet-countunsigned int32
Maximum packet count (1 - 1000000, default = 4000).
non-ipoption
Enable/disable sniffing non-IP packets.
"disable"Disable sniffer for non-IP packets.
"enable"Enable sniffer for non-IP packets.
portstring
Ports to sniff (Format examples: 10, :20, 30:40, 50-, 100-200).
protocolstring
Integer value for the protocol type as defined by IANA (0 - 255).
scan-botnet-connectionsoption
"disable"
"block"
"monitor"
scope memberscope object, refer to device object
spamfilter-profiledatasource, refer to spamfilter profile
spamfilter-profile-statusoption
"disable"
"enable"
statusoption
Enable/disable the active status of the sniffer.
"disable"Disable sniffer status.
"enable"Enable sniffer status.
uuiduuid
uuid-idxunsigned int32
vlanstring
List of VLANs to sniff.
webfilter-profiledatasource, refer to webfilter profile (maximum 1)
Name of an existing web filter profile.
webfilter-profile-statusoption
Enable/disable web filter profile.
"disable"Disable setting.
"enable"Enable setting.

 

fsp/packet-capture/target-ip (table)

Sniffer IPs to filter.

Require device/vdom scope member.

Supported methods: get (table), get (object), add, set, update, delete, clone

Object URL:
Table/pm/config/adom/<adom_name>/obj/fsp/packet-capture/<packet-capture_id>/target-ip
Object/pm/config/adom/<adom_name>/obj/fsp/packet-capture/<packet-capture_id>/target-ip/<target-ip_ip>
Attribute ListDescriptions
descriptionstring
Description for the sniffer IP.
dst-entry-idunsigned int32
FortiSwitch dest entry ID for the sniffer IP.
ipIPv4 address, master key
Sniffer IP.
scope memberscope object, refer to device object
src-entry-idunsigned int32
FortiSwitch source entry ID for the sniffer IP.

 

fsp/packet-capture/target-mac (table)

Sniffer MACs to filter.

Require device/vdom scope member.

Supported methods: get (table), get (object), add, set, update, delete, clone

Object URL:
Table/pm/config/adom/<adom_name>/obj/fsp/packet-capture/<packet-capture_id>/target-mac
Object/pm/config/adom/<adom_name>/obj/fsp/packet-capture/<packet-capture_id>/target-mac/<target-mac_mac>
Attribute ListDescriptions
descriptionstring
Description for the sniffer MAC.
dst-entry-idunsigned int32
FortiSwitch dest entry ID for the sniffer MAC.
macmac address, master key
Sniffer MAC.
scope memberscope object, refer to device object
src-entry-idunsigned int32
FortiSwitch source entry ID for the sniffer MAC.

 

fsp/packet-capture/target-port (table)

Sniffer ports to filter.

Require device/vdom scope member.

Supported methods: get (table), get (object), add, set, update, delete, clone

Object URL:
Table/pm/config/adom/<adom_name>/obj/fsp/packet-capture/<packet-capture_id>/target-port
Object/pm/config/adom/<adom_name>/obj/fsp/packet-capture/<packet-capture_id>/target-port/<target-port_switch-id>
Attribute ListDescriptions
descriptionstring
Description for the sniffer port entry.
in-portsstring array
Configure source ingress port interfaces.
out-portsstring array
Configure source egress port interfaces.
scope memberscope object, refer to device object
switch-iddatasource, refer to fsp managed-switch, master key
Managed-switch ID.

 

fsp/vdom-settings (object)

Require device/vdom scope member.

Supported methods: get, set, update

Object URL:
Table object/pm/config/adom/<adom_name>/obj/fsp/vdom-settings
Attribute ListDescriptions
interface-settingstable
scope memberscope object, refer to device object

 

fsp/vdom-settings/interface-settings (table)

Require device/vdom scope member.

Supported methods: get (table), get (object), add, set, update, delete, clone

Object URL:
Table/pm/config/adom/<adom_name>/obj/fsp/vdom-settings/interface-settings
Object/pm/config/adom/<adom_name>/obj/fsp/vdom-settings/interface-settings/<interface-settings_name>
Attribute ListDescriptions
namestring, master key
scope memberscope object, refer to device object
switch-controller-dynamicdatasource, refer to switch-controller fortilink-settings
switch-controller-nacdatasource, refer to switch-controller fortilink-settings

 

fsp/vlan (table)

FortiSwitch VLAN template.

Supported methods: get (table), get (object), add, set, update, delete, clone

Object URL:
Table/pm/config/adom/<adom_name>/obj/fsp/vlan
Object/pm/config/adom/<adom_name>/obj/fsp/vlan/<vlan_name>
Attribute ListDescriptions
_dhcp-statusoption
"disable"
"enable"
colorunsigned int32
dhcp-serverobject
dynamic_mappingtable
interfaceobject
namestring, master key
vdomstring
vlanidunsigned int32, support meta variable

 

fsp/vlan/dhcp-server (object)

Configure DHCP servers.

Supported methods: get, set, update

Object URL:
Table object/pm/config/adom/<adom_name>/obj/fsp/vlan/<vlan_name>/dhcp-server
Attribute ListDescriptions
auto-configurationoption
Enable/disable auto configuration.
"disable"Disable auto configuration.
"enable"Enable auto configuration.
auto-managed-statusoption
Enable/disable use of this DHCP server once this interface has been assigned an IP address from FortiIPAM.
"disable"Disable use of this DHCP server once this interface has been assigned an IP address from FortiIPAM.
"enable"Enable use of this DHCP server once this interface has been assigned an IP address from FortiIPAM.
conflicted-ip-timeoutunsigned int32
Time in seconds to wait after a conflicted IP address is removed from the DHCP range before it can be reused.
ddns-authoption
DDNS authentication mode.
"disable"Disable DDNS authentication.
"tsig"TSIG based on RFC2845.
ddns-keypassword
DDNS update key (base 64 encoding).
ddns-keynamestring
DDNS update key name.
ddns-server-ipIPv4 address, support meta variable
DDNS server IP.
ddns-ttlunsigned int32
TTL.
ddns-updateoption
Enable/disable DDNS update for DHCP.
"disable"Disable DDNS update for DHCP.
"enable"Enable DDNS update for DHCP.
ddns-update-overrideoption
Enable/disable DDNS update override for DHCP.
"disable"Disable DDNS update override for DHCP.
"enable"Enable DDNS update override for DHCP.
ddns-zonestring
Zone of your domain name (ex. DDNS.com).
default-gatewayIPv4 address, support meta variable
Default gateway IP address assigned by the DHCP server.
dhcp-settings-from-fortiipamoption
Enable/disable populating of DHCP server settings from FortiIPAM.
"disable"Disable populating of DHCP server settings from FortiIPAM.
"enable"Enable populating of DHCP server settings from FortiIPAM.
dns-server1IPv4 address, support meta variable
DNS server 1.
dns-server2IPv4 address, support meta variable
DNS server 2.
dns-server3IPv4 address, support meta variable
DNS server 3.
dns-server4IPv4 address, support meta variable
DNS server 4.
dns-serviceoption
Options for assigning DNS servers to DHCP clients.
"default"Clients are assigned the FortiGate's configured DNS servers.
"specify"Specify up to 3 DNS servers in the DHCP server configuration.
"local"IP address of the interface the DHCP server is added to becomes the client's DNS server IP address.
domainstring
Domain name suffix for the IP addresses that the DHCP server assigns to clients.
enableoption
"disable"
"enable"
exclude-rangetable
filenamestring
Name of the boot file on the TFTP server.
forticlient-on-net-statusoption
Enable/disable FortiClient-On-Net service for this DHCP server.
"disable"Disable FortiClient On-Net Status.
"enable"Enable FortiClient On-Net Status.
idsequence
ID.
ip-modeoption
Method used to assign client IP.
"range"Use range defined by start-ip/end-ip to assign client IP.
"usrgrp"Use user-group defined method to assign client IP.
ip-rangetable
ipsec-lease-holdunsigned int32
DHCP over IPsec leases expire this many seconds after tunnel down (0 to disable forced-expiry).
lease-timeunsigned int32
Lease time in seconds, 0 means unlimited.
mac-acl-default-actionoption
MAC access control default action (allow or block assigning IP settings).
"assign"Allow the DHCP server to assign IP settings to clients on the MAC access control list.
"block"Block the DHCP server from assigning IP settings to clients on the MAC access control list.
netmaskIPv4 mask, support meta variable
Netmask assigned by the DHCP server.
next-serverIPv4 address, support meta variable
IP address of a server (for example, a TFTP sever) that DHCP clients can download a boot file from.
ntp-server1IPv4 address, support meta variable
NTP server 1.
ntp-server2IPv4 address, support meta variable
NTP server 2.
ntp-server3IPv4 address, support meta variable
NTP server 3.
ntp-serviceoption
Options for assigning Network Time Protocol (NTP) servers to DHCP clients.
"default"Clients are assigned the FortiGate's configured NTP servers.
"specify"Specify up to 3 NTP servers in the DHCP server configuration.
"local"IP address of the interface the DHCP server is added to becomes the client's NTP server IP address.
option1string array
option2string array
option3string array
option4string
option5string
option6string
optionstable
relay-agentIPv4 address
reserved-addresstable
server-typeoption
DHCP server can be a normal DHCP server or an IPsec DHCP server.
"regular"Regular DHCP service.
"ipsec"DHCP over IPsec service.
shared-subnetoption
"disable"
"enable"
statusoption
Enable/disable this DHCP configuration.
"disable"Do not use this DHCP server configuration.
"enable"Use this DHCP server configuration.
tftp-serverstring array
One or more hostnames or IP addresses of the TFTP servers in quotes separated by spaces.
timezoneoption
Select the time zone to be assigned to DHCP clients.
"00"(GMT+12:00) Eniwetok, Kwajalein
"01"(GMT-11:00) Midway Island, Samoa
"02"(GMT-10:00) Hawaii

"87"(GMT-4:00) Paraguay
timezone-optionoption
Options for the DHCP server to set the client's time zone.
"disable"Do not set the client's time zone.
"default"Clients are assigned the FortiGate's configured time zone.
"specify"Specify the time zone to be assigned to DHCP clients.
vci-matchoption
Enable/disable vendor class identifier (VCI) matching. When enabled only DHCP requests with a matching VCI are served.
"disable"Disable VCI matching.
"enable"Enable VCI matching.
vci-stringstring array
One or more VCI strings in quotes separated by spaces.
wifi-ac-serviceoption
Options for assigning WiFi access controllers to DHCP clients.
"specify"Specify up to 3 WiFi Access Controllers in the DHCP server configuration.
"local"IP address of the interface the DHCP server is added to becomes the client's WiFi Access Controller IP address.
wifi-ac1IPv4 address
WiFi Access Controller 1 IP address (DHCP option 138, RFC 5417).
wifi-ac2IPv4 address
WiFi Access Controller 2 IP address (DHCP option 138, RFC 5417).
wifi-ac3IPv4 address
WiFi Access Controller 3 IP address (DHCP option 138, RFC 5417).
wins-server1IPv4 address
WINS server 1.
wins-server2IPv4 address
WINS server 2.

 

fsp/vlan/dhcp-server/exclude-range (table)

Exclude one or more ranges of IP addresses from being assigned to clients.

Supported methods: get (table), get (object), add, set, update, delete, clone

Object URL:
Table/pm/config/adom/<adom_name>/obj/fsp/vlan/<vlan_name>/dhcp-server/exclude-range
Object/pm/config/adom/<adom_name>/obj/fsp/vlan/<vlan_name>/dhcp-server/exclude-range/<exclude-range_id>
Attribute ListDescriptions
end-ipIPv4 address
End of IP range.
idsequence, master key
ID.
lease-timeunsigned int32
start-ipIPv4 address
Start of IP range.
uci-matchoption
"disable"
"enable"
uci-stringstring array
vci-matchoption
"disable"
"enable"
vci-stringstring array

Supported methods: get (table), get (object), add, set, update, delete, clone

Object URL:
Table/pm/config/adom/<adom_name>/obj/fsp/vlan/<vlan_name>/dhcp-server/options
Object/pm/config/adom/<adom_name>/obj/fsp/vlan/<vlan_name>/dhcp-server/options/<options_id>
Attribute ListDescriptions
codeunsigned int32
DHCP option code.
idsequence, master key
ID.
ipIPv4 address array
DHCP option IPs.
typeoption
DHCP option type.
"hex"DHCP option in hex.
"string"DHCP option in string.
"ip"DHCP option in IP.
"fqdn"DHCP option in domain search option format.
uci-matchoption
"disable"
"enable"
uci-stringstring array
valuestring
DHCP option value.
vci-matchoption
"disable"
"enable"
vci-stringstring array

 

fsp/vlan/dhcp-server/reserved-address (table)

Options for the DHCP server to assign IP settings to specific MAC addresses.

Supported methods: get (table), get (object), add, set, update, delete, clone

Object URL:
Table/pm/config/adom/<adom_name>/obj/fsp/vlan/<vlan_name>/dhcp-server/reserved-address
Object/pm/config/adom/<adom_name>/obj/fsp/vlan/<vlan_name>/dhcp-server/reserved-address/<reserved-address_id>
Attribute ListDescriptions
actionoption
Options for the DHCP server to configure the client with the reserved MAC address.
"assign"Configure the client with this MAC address like any other client.
"block"Block the DHCP server from assigning IP settings to the client with this MAC address.
"reserved"Assign the reserved IP address to the client with this MAC address.
circuit-idstring
Option 82 circuit-ID of the client that will get the reserved IP address.
circuit-id-typeoption
DHCP option type.
"hex"DHCP option in hex.
"string"DHCP option in string.
descriptionstring
Description.
idsequence, master key
ID.
ipIPv4 address
IP address to be reserved for the MAC address.
macmac address
MAC address of the client that will get the reserved IP address.
remote-idstring
Option 82 remote-ID of the client that will get the reserved IP address.
remote-id-typeoption
DHCP option type.
"hex"DHCP option in hex.
"string"DHCP option in string.
typeoption
DHCP reserved-address type.
"mac"Match with MAC address.
"option82"Match with DHCP option 82.

 

fsp/vlan/dynamic_mapping (table)

Supported methods: get (table), get (object), add, set, update, delete, clone

Object URL:
Table/pm/config/adom/<adom_name>/obj/fsp/vlan/<vlan_name>/dynamic_mapping
Object/pm/config/adom/<adom_name>/obj/fsp/vlan/<vlan_name>/dynamic_mapping/<device_name>/<vdom_name>
Attribute ListDescriptions
_dhcp-statusoption
"disable"
"enable"
_scopescope object, master key
dhcp-serverobject
interfaceobject

 

fsp/vlan/dynamic_mapping/dhcp-server (object)

Configure DHCP servers.

Supported methods: get, set, update

Object URL:
Table object/pm/config/adom/<adom_name>/obj/fsp/vlan/<vlan_name>/dynamic_mapping/<device_name>/<vdom_name>/dhcp-server
Attribute ListDescriptions
auto-configurationoption
Enable/disable auto configuration.
"disable"Disable auto configuration.
"enable"Enable auto configuration.
auto-managed-statusoption
Enable/disable use of this DHCP server once this interface has been assigned an IP address from FortiIPAM.
"disable"Disable use of this DHCP server once this interface has been assigned an IP address from FortiIPAM.
"enable"Enable use of this DHCP server once this interface has been assigned an IP address from FortiIPAM.
conflicted-ip-timeoutunsigned int32
Time in seconds to wait after a conflicted IP address is removed from the DHCP range before it can be reused.
ddns-authoption
DDNS authentication mode.
"disable"Disable DDNS authentication.
"tsig"TSIG based on RFC2845.
ddns-keypassword
DDNS update key (base 64 encoding).
ddns-keynamestring
DDNS update key name.
ddns-server-ipIPv4 address, support meta variable
DDNS server IP.
ddns-ttlunsigned int32
TTL.
ddns-updateoption
Enable/disable DDNS update for DHCP.
"disable"Disable DDNS update for DHCP.
"enable"Enable DDNS update for DHCP.
ddns-update-overrideoption
Enable/disable DDNS update override for DHCP.
"disable"Disable DDNS update override for DHCP.
"enable"Enable DDNS update override for DHCP.
ddns-zonestring
Zone of your domain name (ex. DDNS.com).
default-gatewayIPv4 address, support meta variable
Default gateway IP address assigned by the DHCP server.
dhcp-settings-from-fortiipamoption
Enable/disable populating of DHCP server settings from FortiIPAM.
"disable"Disable populating of DHCP server settings from FortiIPAM.
"enable"Enable populating of DHCP server settings from FortiIPAM.
dns-server1IPv4 address, support meta variable
DNS server 1.
dns-server2IPv4 address, support meta variable
DNS server 2.
dns-server3IPv4 address, support meta variable
DNS server 3.
dns-server4IPv4 address, support meta variable
DNS server 4.
dns-serviceoption
Options for assigning DNS servers to DHCP clients.
"default"Clients are assigned the FortiGate's configured DNS servers.
"specify"Specify up to 3 DNS servers in the DHCP server configuration.
"local"IP address of the interface the DHCP server is added to becomes the client's DNS server IP address.
domainstring
Domain name suffix for the IP addresses that the DHCP server assigns to clients.
enableoption
"disable"
"enable"
exclude-rangetable
filenamestring
Name of the boot file on the TFTP server.
forticlient-on-net-statusoption
Enable/disable FortiClient-On-Net service for this DHCP server.
"disable"Disable FortiClient On-Net Status.
"enable"Enable FortiClient On-Net Status.
idsequence
ID.
ip-modeoption
Method used to assign client IP.
"range"Use range defined by start-ip/end-ip to assign client IP.
"usrgrp"Use user-group defined method to assign client IP.
ip-rangetable
ipsec-lease-holdunsigned int32
DHCP over IPsec leases expire this many seconds after tunnel down (0 to disable forced-expiry).
lease-timeunsigned int32
Lease time in seconds, 0 means unlimited.
mac-acl-default-actionoption
MAC access control default action (allow or block assigning IP settings).
"assign"Allow the DHCP server to assign IP settings to clients on the MAC access control list.
"block"Block the DHCP server from assigning IP settings to clients on the MAC access control list.
netmaskIPv4 mask, support meta variable
Netmask assigned by the DHCP server.
next-serverIPv4 address, support meta variable
IP address of a server (for example, a TFTP sever) that DHCP clients can download a boot file from.
ntp-server1IPv4 address, support meta variable
NTP server 1.
ntp-server2IPv4 address, support meta variable
NTP server 2.
ntp-server3IPv4 address, support meta variable
NTP server 3.
ntp-serviceoption
Options for assigning Network Time Protocol (NTP) servers to DHCP clients.
"default"Clients are assigned the FortiGate's configured NTP servers.
"specify"Specify up to 3 NTP servers in the DHCP server configuration.
"local"IP address of the interface the DHCP server is added to becomes the client's NTP server IP address.
option1string array
option2string array
option3string array
option4string
option5string
option6string
optionstable
relay-agentIPv4 address
reserved-addresstable
server-typeoption
DHCP server can be a normal DHCP server or an IPsec DHCP server.
"regular"Regular DHCP service.
"ipsec"DHCP over IPsec service.
shared-subnetoption
"disable"
"enable"
statusoption
Enable/disable this DHCP configuration.
"disable"Do not use this DHCP server configuration.
"enable"Use this DHCP server configuration.
tftp-serverstring array
One or more hostnames or IP addresses of the TFTP servers in quotes separated by spaces.
timezoneoption
Select the time zone to be assigned to DHCP clients.

"disable"Disable VCI matching.
"enable"Enable VCI matching.
vci-stringstring array

"local"IP address of the interface the DHCP server is added to becomes the client's WiFi Access Controller IP address.

fsp/vlan/dynamic_mapping/dhcp-server/reserved-address (table)

Options for the DHCP server to assign IP settings to specific MAC addresses.

Supported methods: get (table), get (object), add, set, update, delete, clone

Object URL:
Table/pm/config/adom/<adom_name>/obj/fsp/vlan/<vlan_name>/dynamic_mapping/<device_name>/<vdom_name>/dhcp-server/reserved-address
Object/pm/config/adom/<adom_name>/obj/fsp/vlan/<vlan_name>/dynamic_mapping/<device_name>/<vdom_name>/dhcp-server/reserved-address/<reserved-address_id>
Attribute ListDescriptions
actionoption
Options for the DHCP server to configure the client with the reserved MAC address.
"assign"Configure the client with this MAC address like any other client.
"block"Block the DHCP server from assigning IP settings to the client with this MAC address.
"reserved"Assign the reserved IP address to the client with this MAC address.
circuit-idstring
Option 82 circuit-ID of the client that will get the reserved IP address.
circuit-id-typeoption
DHCP option type.
"hex"DHCP option in hex.
"string"DHCP option in string.
descriptionstring
Description.
idsequence, master key
ID.
ipIPv4 address
IP address to be reserved for the MAC address.
macmac address
MAC address of the client that will get the reserved IP address.
remote-idstring
Option 82 remote-ID of the client that will get the reserved IP address.
remote-id-typeoption
DHCP option type.
"hex"DHCP option in hex.
"string"DHCP option in string.
typeoption
DHCP reserved-address type.
"mac"Match with MAC address.
"option82"Match with DHCP option 82.

Table object/pm/config/adom/<adom_name>/obj/fsp/vlan/<vlan_name>/dynamic_mapping/<device_name>/<vdom_name>/interface

"disable"
"enable"

"auto"
"sdwan"
"specify"

"disable"
"enable"

"ipsec"

ipv6object

"disable"
"enable"
secondaryiptable
vlaniddatasource
vrrptable

 

fsp/vlan/dynamic_mapping/interface/ipv6 (object)

IPv6 of interface.

Supported methods: get, set, update

Object URL:
Table object/pm/config/adom/<adom_name>/obj/fsp/vlan/<vlan_name>/dynamic_mapping/<device_name>/<vdom_name>/interface/ipv6
Attribute ListDescriptions
autoconfoption
Enable/disable address auto config.
"disable"Disable auto-configuration.
"enable"Enable auto-configuration.
cli-conn6-statusunsigned int32
dhcp6-client-optionsflags
"rapid"
"iapd"
"iana"

Enable/disable DHCPv6 information request.
"disable"Disable DHCPv6 information request.
"enable"Enable DHCPv6 information request.
dhcp6-prefix-delegationoption
Enable/disable DHCPv6 prefix delegation.
"disable"Disable DHCPv6 prefix delegation.
"enable"Enable DHCPv6 prefix delegation.
dhcp6-prefix-hintIPv6 prefix
DHCPv6 prefix that will be used as a hint to the upstream DHCPv6 server.
dhcp6-prefix-hint-pltunsigned int32
DHCPv6 prefix hint preferred life time (sec), 0 means unlimited lease time.
dhcp6-prefix-hint-vltunsigned int32
DHCPv6 prefix hint valid life time (sec).

"disable"Disable DHCPv6 relay
"enable"Enable DHCPv6 relay.
dhcp6-relay-source-interfaceoption
"disable"
"enable"

dhcp6-relay-typeoption
DHCPv6 relay type.
"regular"Regular DHCP relay.
icmp6-send-redirectoption
Enable/disable sending of ICMPv6 redirects.
"disable"Disable sending of ICMPv6 redirects.
"enable"Enable sending of ICMPv6 redirects.
interface-identifierIPv6 address
IPv6 interface identifier.
ip6-addressIPv6 prefix, support meta variable
Primary IPv6 address prefix. Syntax: xxxx:xxxx:xxxx:xxxx:xxxx:xxxx:xxxx:xxxx/xxx.
ip6-allowaccessflags, support meta variable
Allow management access to the interface.
"https"HTTPS access.
"ping"PING access.
"ssh"SSH access.
"snmp"SNMP access.
"http"HTTP access.
"telnet"TELNET access.
"fgfm"FortiManager access.
"fabric"Fabric access.
ip6-default-lifeunsigned int32
Default life (sec).
ip6-delegated-prefix-iaidunsigned int32
IAID of obtained delegated-prefix from the upstream interface.
ip6-delegated-prefix-listtable
ip6-dns-server-overrideoption
Enable/disable using the DNS server acquired by DHCP.
"disable"Disable using the DNS server acquired by DHCP.
"enable"Enable using the DNS server acquired by DHCP.
ip6-extra-addrtable
ip6-hop-limitunsigned int32
Hop limit (0 means unspecified).
ip6-link-mtuunsigned int32
IPv6 link MTU.
ip6-manage-flagoption
Enable/disable the managed flag.
"disable"Disable the managed IPv6 flag.
"enable"Enable the managed IPv6 flag.
ip6-max-intervalunsigned int32
IPv6 maximum interval (4 to 1800 sec).
ip6-min-intervalunsigned int32
IPv6 minimum interval (3 to 1350 sec).
ip6-modeoption
Addressing mode (static, DHCP, delegated).
"static"Static setting.
"dhcp"DHCPv6 client mode.
"pppoe"IPv6 over PPPoE mode.
"delegated"IPv6 address with delegated prefix.
ip6-other-flagoption
Enable/disable the other IPv6 flag.
"disable"Disable the other IPv6 flag.
"enable"Enable the other IPv6 flag.
ip6-prefix-listtable
ip6-prefix-modeoption
Assigning a prefix from DHCP or RA.
"dhcp6"Use delegated prefix from a DHCPv6 client to form a delegated IPv6 address.
"ra"Use prefix from RA to form a delegated IPv6 address.
ip6-reachable-timeunsigned int32
IPv6 reachable time (milliseconds; 0 means unspecified).
ip6-retrans-timeunsigned int32
IPv6 retransmit time (milliseconds; 0 means unspecified).
ip6-send-advoption
Enable/disable sending advertisements about the interface.
"disable"Disable sending advertisements about this interface.
"enable"Enable sending advertisements about this interface.
ip6-subnetIPv6 prefix
Subnet to routing prefix. Syntax: xxxx:xxxx:xxxx:xxxx:xxxx:xxxx:xxxx:xxxx/xxx.
ip6-upstream-interfacedatasource, refer to system interface (maximum 1)
Interface name providing delegated information.
nd-certdatasource, refer to certificate local, or vpn certificate local (maximum 1)
Neighbor discovery certificate.
nd-cga-modifierstring
Neighbor discovery CGA modifier.
nd-modeoption
Neighbor discovery mode.
"basic"Do not support SEND.
"SEND-compatible"Support SEND.
nd-security-levelunsigned int32
Neighbor discovery security level (0 - 7; 0 = least secure, default = 0).
nd-timestamp-deltaunsigned int32
Neighbor discovery timestamp delta value (1 - 3600 sec; default = 300).
nd-timestamp-fuzzunsigned int32
Neighbor discovery timestamp fuzz factor (1 - 60 sec; default = 1).
ra-send-mtuoption
Enable/disable sending link MTU in RA packet.
"disable"Disable sending link MTU in RA packet.
"enable"Enable sending link MTU in RA packet.
unique-autoconf-addroption
Enable/disable unique auto config address.
"disable"Disable unique auto-configuration address.
"enable"Enable unique auto-configuration address.
vrip6_link_localIPv6 address

vrrp-virtual-mac6option
Enable/disable virtual MAC for VRRP.
"disable"Disable virtual MAC for VRRP.
"enable"Enable virtual MAC for VRRP.
vrrp6table

fsp/vlan/interface (object)

Configure interfaces.

Supported methods: get, set, update

Object URL:
Table object/pm/config/adom/<adom_name>/obj/fsp/vlan/<vlan_name>/interface
Attribute ListDescriptions
ac-namestring
PPPoE server name.
aggregatestring
aggregate-typeoption
"physical"
"vxlan"
algorithmoption
Frame distribution algorithm.
"L2"Use layer 2 address for distribution.
"L3"Use layer 3 address for distribution.
"L4"Use layer 4 information for distribution.
aliasstring
Alias will be displayed with the interface name to make it easier to distinguish.
allowaccessflags, support meta variable
Permitted types of management access to this interface.
"https"HTTPS access.
"ping"PING access.
"ssh"SSH access.
"snmp"SNMP access.
"http"HTTP access.
"telnet"TELNET access.
"fgfm"FortiManager access.
"radius-acct"RADIUS accounting access.
"probe-response"Probe access.
"dnp"DNP access.
"ftm"FTM access.

"speed-test"Speed test access.

"b"xDSL Annex B

"disable"Disable ARP forwarding.
"enable"Enable ARP forwarding.

"disable"
"enable"

"disable"Disable interface failed option status.
"enable"Enable interface failed option status.

"disable"Block HA slave from sending/receiving LACP messages.

lacp-modeoption
LACP mode.
"static"Use static aggregation, do not send and ignore any LACP messages.
"passive"Passively use LACP to negotiate 802.3ad aggregation.
"active"Actively use LACP to negotiate 802.3ad aggregation.
lacp-speedoption
How often the interface sends LACP messages.
"slow"Send LACP message every 30 seconds.
"fast"Send LACP message every second.

"disable"
"enable"

"disable"Disable WCCP protocol on this interface.
"enable"Enable WCCP protocol on this interface.
weightunsigned int32
Default weight for static routes (if route has no weight configured).
wifi-5g-thresholdstring
Minimal signal strength to be considered as a good 5G AP.
wifi-acloption
Access control for MAC addresses in the MAC list.
"deny"Deny.
"allow"Allow.
wifi-ap-bandoption
How to select the AP to connect.
"any"Connect to the best 2G or 5G AP.
"5g-preferred"Connect to the 5G AP if a good 5G AP exists.
"5g-only"Only connect to the 5G AP.
wifi-authoption
WiFi authentication.
"PSK"PSK.
"radius"RADIUS.
"usergroup"User group.
wifi-auto-connectoption
Enable/disable WiFi network auto connect.
"disable"Disable WiFi network auto connect.
"enable"Enable WiFi network auto connect.
wifi-auto-saveoption
Enable/disable WiFi network automatic save.
"disable"Disable WiFi network automatic save.
"enable"Enable WiFi network automatic save.
wifi-broadcast-ssidoption
Enable/disable SSID broadcast in the beacon.
"disable"Disable SSID broadcast in the beacon.
"enable"Enable SSID broadcast in the beacon.
wifi-dns-server1IPv4 address
wifi-dns-server2IPv4 address
wifi-encryptoption
Data encryption.
"TKIP"TKIP.
"AES"AES.
wifi-fragment-thresholdunsigned int32
WiFi fragment threshold (800 - 2346).
wifi-gatewayIPv4 address
wifi-keypassword
WiFi WEP Key.
wifi-keyindexunsigned int32
WEP key index (1 - 4).
wifi-mac-filteroption
Enable/disable MAC filter status.
"disable"Disable MAC filter.
"enable"Enable MAC filter.
wifi-passphrasepassword
WiFi pre-shared key for WPA.
wifi-radius-serverdatasource, refer to user radius (maximum 1)
WiFi RADIUS server for WPA.
wifi-rts-thresholdunsigned int32
WiFi RTS threshold (256 - 2346).
wifi-securityoption
Wireless access security of SSID.
"wep64"WEP64.
"wep128"WEP128.
"open"Open.
"wpa-personal"WPA personal.
"wpa-enterprise"WPA enterprise.
"wpa-only-personal"WPA personal only.
"wpa-only-enterprise"WPA enterprise only.
"wpa2-only-personal"WPA2 personal only.
"wpa2-only-enterprise"WPA2 enterprise only.
wifi-ssidstring
IEEE 802.11 Service Set Identifier.
wifi-usergroupstring
WiFi user group for WPA.
wins-ipIPv4 address
WINS server IP.

IPv6 of interface.

Supported methods: get, set, update

Object URL:
Table object/pm/config/adom/<adom_name>/obj/fsp/vlan/<vlan_name>/interface/ipv6
Attribute ListDescriptions
autoconfoption
Enable/disable address auto config.
"disable"Disable auto-configuration.
"enable"Enable auto-configuration.
cli-conn6-statusunsigned int32
dhcp6-client-optionsflags
"rapid"
"iapd"
"iana"

Enable/disable DHCPv6 information request.
"disable"Disable DHCPv6 information request.
"enable"Enable DHCPv6 information request.
dhcp6-prefix-delegationoption
Enable/disable DHCPv6 prefix delegation.
"disable"Disable DHCPv6 prefix delegation.
"enable"Enable DHCPv6 prefix delegation.
dhcp6-prefix-hintIPv6 prefix
DHCPv6 prefix that will be used as a hint to the upstream DHCPv6 server.
dhcp6-prefix-hint-pltunsigned int32
DHCPv6 prefix hint preferred life time (sec), 0 means unlimited lease time.
dhcp6-prefix-hint-vltunsigned int32
DHCPv6 prefix hint valid life time (sec).
dhcp6-relay-interface-idstring
dhcp6-relay-ipIPv6 address array

"disable"Disable DHCPv6 relay
"enable"Enable DHCPv6 relay.

"disable"
"enable"
dhcp6-relay-source-ipIPv6 address
dhcp6-relay-typeoption
DHCPv6 relay type.
"regular"Regular DHCP relay.
icmp6-send-redirectoption
Enable/disable sending of ICMPv6 redirects.
"disable"Disable sending of ICMPv6 redirects.
"enable"Enable sending of ICMPv6 redirects.
interface-identifierIPv6 address
IPv6 interface identifier.
ip6-addressIPv6 prefix, support meta variable
Primary IPv6 address prefix. Syntax: xxxx:xxxx:xxxx:xxxx:xxxx:xxxx:xxxx:xxxx/xxx.
ip6-allowaccessflags, support meta variable
Allow management access to the interface.
"https"HTTPS access.
"ping"PING access.
"ssh"SSH access.
"snmp"SNMP access.
"http"HTTP access.
"telnet"TELNET access.
"fgfm"FortiManager access.
"fabric"Fabric access.
ip6-default-lifeunsigned int32

ip6-delegated-prefix-iaidunsigned int32
IAID of obtained delegated-prefix from the upstream interface.
ip6-delegated-prefix-listtable
ip6-dns-server-overrideoption
Enable/disable using the DNS server acquired by DHCP.
"disable"Disable using the DNS server acquired by DHCP.
"enable"Enable using the DNS server acquired by DHCP.
ip6-extra-addrtable
ip6-hop-limitunsigned int32
Hop limit (0 means unspecified).
ip6-link-mtuunsigned int32
IPv6 link MTU.
ip6-manage-flagoption
Enable/disable the managed flag.
"disable"Disable the managed IPv6 flag.
"enable"Enable the managed IPv6 flag.
ip6-max-intervalunsigned int32
IPv6 maximum interval (4 to 1800 sec).
ip6-min-intervalunsigned int32
IPv6 minimum interval (3 to 1350 sec).
ip6-modeoption
Addressing mode (static, DHCP, delegated).
"static"Static setting.
"dhcp"DHCPv6 client mode.
"pppoe"IPv6 over PPPoE mode.
"delegated"IPv6 address with delegated prefix.
ip6-other-flagoption
Enable/disable the other IPv6 flag.
"disable"Disable the other IPv6 flag.
"enable"Enable the other IPv6 flag.
ip6-prefix-listtable
ip6-prefix-modeoption
Assigning a prefix from DHCP or RA.
"dhcp6"Use delegated prefix from a DHCPv6 client to form a delegated IPv6 address.
"ra"Use prefix from RA to form a delegated IPv6 address.
ip6-reachable-timeunsigned int32
IPv6 reachable time (milliseconds; 0 means unspecified).
ip6-retrans-timeunsigned int32
IPv6 retransmit time (milliseconds; 0 means unspecified).
ip6-send-advoption
Enable/disable sending advertisements about the interface.
"disable"Disable sending advertisements about this interface.
"enable"Enable sending advertisements about this interface.
ip6-subnetIPv6 prefix
Subnet to routing prefix. Syntax: xxxx:xxxx:xxxx:xxxx:xxxx:xxxx:xxxx:xxxx/xxx.
ip6-upstream-interfacedatasource, refer to system interface (maximum 1)
Interface name providing delegated information.
nd-certdatasource, refer to certificate local, or vpn certificate local (maximum 1)
Neighbor discovery certificate.
nd-cga-modifierstring
Neighbor discovery CGA modifier.
nd-modeoption
Neighbor discovery mode.
"basic"Do not support SEND.
"SEND-compatible"Support SEND.
nd-security-levelunsigned int32
Neighbor discovery security level (0 - 7; 0 = least secure, default = 0).
nd-timestamp-deltaunsigned int32
Neighbor discovery timestamp delta value (1 - 3600 sec; default = 300).
nd-timestamp-fuzzunsigned int32
Neighbor discovery timestamp fuzz factor (1 - 60 sec; default = 1).
ra-send-mtuoption
Enable/disable sending link MTU in RA packet.
"disable"Disable sending link MTU in RA packet.
"enable"Enable sending link MTU in RA packet.
unique-autoconf-addroption
Enable/disable unique auto config address.
"disable"Disable unique auto-configuration address.
"enable"Enable unique auto-configuration address.
vrip6_link_localIPv6 address

"disable"Disable virtual MAC for VRRP.
"enable"Enable virtual MAC for VRRP.
vrrp6table

String of commands to send to FortiSwitch devices (For example (%0a = return key): config switch trunk %0a edit myTrunk %0a set members port1 port2 %0a end %0a).

Command name called by the FortiGate switch controller in the execute command.
descriptionstring
Description.

Attribute ListDescriptions
assign-vlanoption
Enable/disable VLAN assignment when this profile is applied on managed FortiSwitch port.
"disable"Disable VLAN assignment when this profile is applied on port.
"enable"Enable VLAN assignment when this profile is applied on port.
dscpunsigned int32
Advertised Differentiated Services Code Point (DSCP) value, a packet header value indicating the level of service requested for traffic, such as high priority or best effort delivery.
namestring, master key
Policy type name.
priorityunsigned int32
Advertised Layer 2 priority (0 - 7; from lowest to highest priority).
statusoption
Enable or disable this TLV.
"disable"Do not transmit this network policy TLV.
"enable"Transmit this TLV if a VLAN has been addded to the port.
vlanunsigned int32
ID of VLAN to advertise, if configured on port (0 - 4094, 0 = priority tag).
vlan-intfdatasource, refer to system interface, or fsp vlan (maximum 1)
VLAN interface to advertise; if configured on port.

 

switch-controller/mac-policy (table)

Configure MAC policy to be applied on the managed FortiSwitch devices through NAC device.

Supported methods: get (table), get (object), add, set, update, delete, clone

Object URL:
Table/pm/config/adom/<adom_name>/obj/switch-controller/mac-policy
Object/pm/config/adom/<adom_name>/obj/switch-controller/mac-policy/<mac-policy_name>
Attribute ListDescriptions
bounce-port-linkoption
Enable/disable bouncing (administratively bring the link down, up) of a switch port where this mac-policy is applied.
"disable"Disable bouncing (administratively bring the link down, up) of a switch port where this mac-policy is applied.
"enable"Enable bouncing (administratively bring the link down, up) of a switch port where this mac-policy is applied.
countoption
Enable/disable packet count on the NAC device.
"disable"Enable packet count on the NAC device.
"enable"Disable packet count on the NAC device.
descriptionstring
Description for the MAC policy.
namestring, master key
MAC policy name.
traffic-policydatasource, refer to switch-controller traffic-policy (maximum 1)
Traffic policy to be applied when using this MAC policy.
vlandatasource, refer to system interface, or dynamic interface (maximum 1) (36 bytes)
Ingress traffic VLAN assignment for the MAC address matching this MAC policy.

 

switch-controller/managed-switch (table)

FortiSwitch Template.

Configure FortiSwitch devices that are managed by this FortiGate.

Supported methods: get (table), get (object), add, set, update, delete, move, clone

Object URL:
Table/pm/config/adom/<adom_name>/obj/switch-controller/managed-switch
Object/pm/config/adom/<adom_name>/obj/switch-controller/managed-switch/<managed-switch_switch-id>
Attribute ListDescriptions
_platformstring
custom-commandtable
descriptionstring
Description.
dhcp-server-access-listoption
DHCP snooping server access list.
"disable"Override global setting and disable DHCP server access list.
"enable"Override global setting and enable DHCP server access list.
"global"Use global setting for DHCP snooping server access list.
firmware-provisionoption
Enable/disable provisioning of firmware to FortiSwitches on join connection.
"disable"Disable firmware-provision.
"enable"Enable firmware-provision.
firmware-provision-latestoption
Enable/disable one-time automatic provisioning of the latest firmware version.
"disable"Do not automatically provision the latest available firmware.
"once"Automatically attempt a one-time upgrade to the latest available firmware version.
firmware-provision-versionstring
Firmware version to provision to this FortiSwitch on bootup (major.minor.build, i.e. 6.2.1234).
l3-discoveredunsigned int32
mclag-igmp-snooping-awareoption
Enable/disable MCLAG IGMP-snooping awareness.
"disable"Disable MCLAG IGMP-snooping awareness.
"enable"Enable MCLAG IGMP-snooping awareness.
namestring (127 bytes)

override-snmp-communityoption
Enable/disable overriding the global SNMP communities.
"disable"Use the global SNMP communities.
"enable"Override the global SNMP communities.
override-snmp-sysinfooption
Enable/disable overriding the global SNMP system information.
"disable"Use the global SNMP system information.
"enable"Override the global SNMP system information.
override-snmp-trap-thresholdoption
Enable/disable overriding the global SNMP trap threshold values.
"disable"Use the global SNMP trap threshold values.
"enable"Override the global SNMP trap threshold values.
override-snmp-useroption

"disable"Use the global SNMPv3 users.
"enable"Override the global SNMPv3 users.

portstable

"random-early-detection"Random early detection drop policy.

switch-idstring (127 bytes), master key
Managed-switch id.
tdr-supportedstring

List of FortiSwitch commands.

switch-controller/managed-switch/ports (table)

Managed-switch port list.

Object URL:

Attribute ListDescriptions
access-modeoption
Access mode of the port.
"nac"NAC mode.
"dynamic"Dynamic mode.
"static"Static mode.
aggregator-modeoption
LACP member select mode.
"bandwidth"Member selection based on largest total bandwidth of links of similar speed.
"count"Member selection based on largest count of similar link speed.
allowed-vlansdatasource, refer to switch-controller vlan, system interface, or fsp vlan
Configure switch port tagged VLANs.
allowed-vlans-alloption
Enable/disable all defined vlans on this port.
"disable"Disable all defined VLANs on this port.
"enable"Enable all defined VLANs on this port.
arp-inspection-trustoption
Trusted or untrusted dynamic ARP inspection.
"untrusted"Untrusted dynamic ARP inspection.
"trusted"Trusted dynamic ARP inspection.
bundleoption
Enable/disable Link Aggregation Group (LAG) bundling for non-FortiLink interfaces.
"disable"Disable bundling.
"enable"Enable bundling.
descriptionstring
Description for port.
dhcp-snoop-option82-trustoption
Enable/disable allowance of DHCP with option-82 on untrusted interface.
"disable"Disable allowance of DHCP with option-82 on untrusted interface.
"enable"Enable allowance of DHCP with option-82 on untrusted interface.
dhcp-snoopingoption
Trusted or untrusted DHCP-snooping interface.
"trusted"Trusted DHCP snooping interface.
"untrusted"Untrusted DHCP snooping interface.
discard-modeoption
Configure discard mode for port.
"none"Discard disabled.
"all-untagged"Discard all frames that are untagged.
"all-tagged"Discard all frames that are tagged.
dsl-profiledatasource, refer to switch-controller dsl policy (maximum 1)
DSL policy configuration.
edge-portoption
Enable/disable this interface as an edge port, bridging connections between workstations and/or computers.
"disable"Disable this interface as an edge port.
"enable"Enable this interface as an edge port.
fec-capableunsigned int32
FEC capable.
fec-stateoption
State of forward error correction.
"disabled"Disable forward error correction.
"cl74"Enable Clause 74 FC-FEC, which only applies to 25Gbps.
"cl91"Enable Clause 91 RS-FEC, which only applies to 100Gbps.
flow-controloption
Flow control direction.
"disable"Disable flow control.
"tx"Enable flow control for transmission pause control frames.
"rx"Enable flow control for receive pause control frames.
"both"Enable flow control for both transmission and receive pause control frames.
igmps-flood-reportsoption
Enable/disable flooding of IGMP reports to this interface when igmp-snooping enabled.
"disable"Disable flooding of IGMP snooping reports to this interface.
"enable"Enable flooding of IGMP snooping reports to this interface.
igmps-flood-trafficoption
Enable/disable flooding of IGMP snooping traffic to this interface.
"disable"Disable flooding of IGMP snooping traffic to this interface.
"enable"Enable flooding of IGMP snooping traffic to this interface.
interface-tagsdatasource, refer to switch-controller switch-interface-tag
Tag(s) associated with the interface for various features including virtual port pool, dynamic port policy.
ip-source-guardoption
Enable/disable IP source guard.
"disable"Disable IP source guard.
"enable"Enable IP source guard.
lacp-speedoption
End Link Aggregation Control Protocol (LACP) messages every 30 seconds (slow) or every second (fast).
"slow"Send LACP message every 30 seconds.
"fast"Send LACP message every second.
learning-limitunsigned int32
Limit the number of dynamic MAC addresses on this Port (1 - 128, 0 = no limit, default).
lldp-profiledatasource, refer to switch-controller lldp-profile (maximum 1)
LLDP port TLV profile.
lldp-statusoption
LLDP transmit and receive status.
"disable"Disable LLDP TX and RX.
"rx-only"Enable LLDP as RX only.
"tx-only"Enable LLDP as TX only.
"tx-rx"Enable LLDP TX and RX.
loop-guardoption
Enable/disable loop-guard on this interface, an STP optimization used to prevent network loops.
"disabled"Disable loop-guard on this interface.
"enabled"Enable loop-guard on this interface.
loop-guard-timeoutunsigned int32
Loop-guard timeout (0 - 120 min, default = 45).
matched-dpp-intf-tagsstring
Matched interface tags in the dynamic port policy.
matched-dpp-policystring
Matched child policy in the dynamic port policy.
max-bundleunsigned int32
Maximum size of LAG bundle (1 - 24, default = 24).
mclagoption
Enable/disable multi-chassis link aggregation (MCLAG).
"disable"Disable MCLAG.
"enable"Enable MCLAG.
mclag-icl-portunsigned int32
media-typestring
member-withdrawal-behavioroption
Port behavior after it withdraws because of loss of control packets.
"forward"Forward traffic.
"block"Block traffic.
membersstring array
Aggregated LAG bundle interfaces.
min-bundleunsigned int32
Minimum size of LAG bundle (1 - 24, default = 1).
modeoption
LACP mode: ignore and do not send control messages, or negotiate 802.3ad aggregation passively or actively.
"static"Static aggregation, do not send and ignore any control messages.
"lacp-passive"Passively use LACP to negotiate 802.3ad aggregation.
"lacp-active"Actively use LACP to negotiate 802.3ad aggregation.
p2p-portunsigned int32
packet-sample-rateunsigned int32
Packet sampling rate (0 - 99999 p/sec).
packet-sampleroption
Enable/disable packet sampling on this interface.
"disabled"Disable packet sampling on this interface.
"enabled"Enable packet sampling on this interface.
pause-meterunsigned int32
Configure ingress pause metering rate, in kbps (default = 0, disabled).
pause-meter-resumeoption
Resume threshold for resuming traffic on ingress port.
"25%"Back pressure state won't be cleared until bucket count falls below 25% of pause threshold.
"50%"Back pressure state won't be cleared until bucket count falls below 50% of pause threshold.
"75%"Back pressure state won't be cleared until bucket count falls below 75% of pause threshold.
poe-max-powerstring
poe-pre-standard-detectionoption
Enable/disable PoE pre-standard detection.
"disable"Disable PoE pre-standard detection.
"enable"Enable PoE pre-standard detection.
poe-standardstring
poe-statusoption
Enable/disable PoE status.
"disable"Disable PoE status.
"enable"Enable PoE status.
port-namestring, master key
Switch port name.
port-ownerstring
Switch port name.
port-policydatasource, refer to switch-controller dynamic-port-policy (maximum 1)
Switch controller dynamic port policy from available options.
port-security-policydatasource, refer to switch-controller security-policy 802-1X (maximum 1)
Switch controller authentication policy to apply to this managed switch from available options.
port-selection-criteriaoption
Algorithm for aggregate port selection.
"src-mac"Source MAC address.
"dst-mac"Destination MAC address.
"src-dst-mac"Source and destination MAC address.
"src-ip"Source IP address.
"dst-ip"Destination IP address.
"src-dst-ip"Source and destination IP address.
qos-policydatasource, refer to switch-controller qos qos-policy (maximum 1)
Switch controller QoS policy from available options.
rpvst-portoption
Enable/disable inter-operability with rapid PVST on this interface.
"disabled"Disable inter-operability with rapid PVST on this interface.
"enabled"Enable inter-operability with rapid PVST on this interface.
sample-directionoption
Packet sampling direction.
"rx"Monitor received traffic.
"tx"Monitor transmitted traffic.
"both"Monitor transmitted and received traffic.
sflow-counter-intervalunsigned int32
sFlow sampling counter polling interval in seconds (0 - 255).
statusoption
Switch port admin status: up or down.
"down"Set admin status down.
"up"Set admin status up.
sticky-macoption
Enable or disable sticky-mac on the interface.
"disable"Disable sticky mac on the interface.
"enable"Enable sticky mac on the interface.
stp-bpdu-guardoption
Enable/disable STP BPDU guard on this interface.
"disabled"Disable STP BPDU guard on this interface.
"enabled"Enable STP BPDU guard on this interface.
stp-bpdu-guard-timeoutunsigned int32
BPDU Guard disabling protection (0 - 120 min).
stp-root-guardoption
Enable/disable STP root guard on this interface.
"disabled"Disable STP root-guard on this interface.
"enabled"Enable STP root-guard on this interface.
stp-stateoption

"disabled"Disable STP on this interface.
"enabled"Enable STP on this interface.
trunk-memberunsigned int32

typeoption
Interface type: physical or trunk port.
"physical"Physical port.
"trunk"Trunk port.

vlandatasource, refer to switch-controller vlan, system interface, or fsp vlan (maximum 1)

switch-controller/security-policy/802-1X (table)

Configure 802.1x MAC Authentication Bypass (MAB) policies.

Supported methods: get (table), get (object), add, set, update, delete, clone

Object URL:
Table/pm/config/adom/<adom_name>/obj/switch-controller/security-policy/802-1X

Attribute ListDescriptions
auth-fail-vlanoption
Enable to allow limited access to clients that cannot authenticate.
"disable"Disable authentication fail VLAN on this interface.
"enable"Enable authentication fail VLAN on this interface.

auth-fail-vlanidunsigned int32

authserver-timeout-periodunsigned int32

Enable/disable the authentication server timeout VLAN to allow limited access when RADIUS is unavailable.
"disable"Disable authentication server timeout VLAN on this interface.
"enable"Enable authentication server timeout VLAN on this interface.

"disable"Disable automatic inclusion of untagged VLANs.
"enable"Enable automatic inclusion of untagged VLANs.
eap-passthruoption
Enable/disable EAP pass-through mode, allowing protocols (such as LLDP) to pass through ports for more flexible authentication.
"disable"Disable EAP pass-through mode on this interface.
"enable"Enable EAP pass-through mode on this interface.
framevid-applyoption
Enable/disable the capability to apply the EAP/MAB frame VLAN to the port native VLAN.
"disable"Disable the capability to apply the EAP/MAB frame VLAN to the port native VLAN.
"enable"Enable the capability to apply the EAP/MAB frame VLAN to the port native VLAN.

guest-vlanoption
Enable the guest VLAN feature to allow limited access to non-802.1X-compliant clients.
"disable"Disable guest VLAN on this interface.
"enable"Enable guest VLAN on this interface.

"disable"Disable MAB.
"enable"Enable MAB.
